statements: SELECT * FROM MedicationInventory;
SELECT medication_name, expiration_date FROM MedicationInventory;
SELECT * FROM MedicationInventory WHERE inventory_level > 10;
SELECT medication_name, expiration_date FROM MedicationInventory WHERE expiration_date < NOW();
SELECT * FROM MedicationInventory ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM MedicationInventory WHERE expiration_date > NOW() ORDER BY medication_name DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT medication_name, inventory_level FROM MedicationInventory WHERE inventory_level < 50 ORDER BY expiration_date ASC
SELECT medication_id, expiration_date FROM MedicationInventory WHERE medication_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM MedicationInventory WHERE expiration_date < '2022-01-01' OR inventory_level > 100
SELECT MAX(inventory_level) AS max_inventory_level, MIN(inventory_level) AS min_inventory_level FROM MedicationInventory
SELECT * FROM medications;
SELECT medication_name, inventory_level FROM medications WHERE expiration_date > '2022-10-01';
SELECT * FROM restocking_logs ORDER BY restocking_date DESC;

SELECT medication_name, quantity_restocked FROM medications JOIN restocking_logs ON medications.medication_id = restocking_logs.medication_id WHERE restocking_date BETWEEN '2022-09-01' AND '2022-09-30';
SELECT medication_name, inventory_level FROM medications WHERE inventory_level < 10 ORDER BY inventory_level ASC;
SELECT medication_name, expiration_date FROM medications WHERE inventory_level > 50 ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT medication_name, inventory_level FROM medications WHERE expiration_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY inventory_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM restocking_logs WHERE quantity_restocked > 100 ORDER BY restocking_date DESC;
SELECT r.restocking_date, m.medication_name FROM restocking_logs r JOIN medications m ON r.medication_id = m.medication_id WHERE r.quantity_restocked > 50 ORDER BY r.restocking_date ASC;

SELECT m.medication_name, r.restocking_date, r.quantity_restocked FROM medications m JOIN restocking_logs r ON m.medication_id = r.medication_id WHERE m.inventory_level < 20 ORDER BY m.medication_name ASC, r.restocking_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Medications;
SELECT name, quantity FROM Medications WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT id, name, expiration_date FROM Medications ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE stock_quantity < 50;
SELECT e.medication_id, m.name, e.expiration_date FROM Expirations e JOIN Medications m ON m.id = e.medication_id WHERE e.days_left_until_expired < 30;
SELECT * FROM Medications ORDER BY name DESC, quantity ASC;
SELECT name, expiration_date FROM Medications WHERE quantity > 50;

SELECT Inventory.location, Medications.name, Expirations.days_left_until_expired FROM Inventory JOIN Medications ON Inventory.medication_id = Medications.id JOIN Expirations ON Inventory.medication_id = Expirations.medication_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_expired FROM Expirations WHERE days_left_until_expired <= 0;

SELECT Medications.name AS medication_name, Inventory.location AS stock_location FROM Medications JOIN Inventory ON Medications.id = Inventory.medication_id WHERE Inventory.stock_quantity > 100 ORDER BY medication_name ASC;
SELECT id, name, expiration_date FROM Medications;
SELECT name, quantity FROM Medications ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers WHERE name = 'Example Supplier';
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-03-31';
SELECT Orders.id, Medications.name, Orders.quantity FROM Orders JOIN Medications ON Orders.medication_id = Medications.id;
SELECT * FROM Medications;
SELECT name, quantity FROM Medications WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT name, expiration_date FROM Medications ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT Orders.order_date, Medications.name, Orders.quantity FROM Orders JOIN Medications ON Orders.medication_id = Medications.id;

SELECT Suppliers.name AS supplier_name, Orders.quantity AS order_quantity, RestockingLogs.restock_quantity AS restock_quantity FROM Suppliers JOIN Orders ON Suppliers.id = Orders.id JOIN RestockingLogs ON Orders.id = RestockingLogs.order_id;
SELECT * FROM medication_inventory;
SELECT id, medication_name, expiration_date FROM medication_inventory WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM medication_suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT action_type, user_id, action_timestamp FROM medication_audit_log WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT location_name, address FROM medication_locations WHERE location_name LIKE 'Medical%';
SELECT * FROM medication_inventory ORDER BY expiration_date DESC, quantity ASC
SELECT medication_name, quantity FROM medication_inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM medication_stock_history WHERE history_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY history_date ASC
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM medication_suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name
SELECT location_name, address FROM medication_locations
